qaModelId.description: The id of the qa model.

name.description: The name of the qa model.

description.description: The description of the qa model.

version.description: The version of the qa model.

activeReviews.description: The amount of active reviews for the qa model.

completedReviews.description: The amount of completed reviews for the qa model.

isActive.description: Whether the qa model is active.

isReadonly.description: Whether the qa model is readonly.

createdDate.description: The date to which the qa model was created.

modifiedDate.description: The date to which the qa model was last modified.

activatedDate.description: The date to which the qa model was activated.

modifiedBy.description: The person to which the qa model was last modified.

statusCode.description: Code for an enumerated condition. Either 'active', 'draft', or 'archived'.

status.description: Description for an enumerated condition. Either 'active', 'draft', or 'archived'.
